H0.text: Color is the property of an object that is identified using the sense of smell.

H1.text: Odor is the property of an object that is identified using the sense of smell.

H2.text: Temperature is the property of an object that is identified using the sense of smell.

H3.text: Weight is the property of an object that is identified using the sense of smell.

A4.text: The perception of odors, or sense of smell, is mediated by the olfactory nerve.
